attributes.action: Increase Funding on Cancer Research For Diagnosis And Treatment
attributes.additional_details: I have many family members who have had to experience bad treatment and long diagnosis wait times.
attributes.background: Spend more on the NHS and cancer research foundations to treat and diagnose cancer in the UK

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Increase funding for NHS cancer care to make patients access treatments quicker
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743042
